brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of this study was to determine the histopathological results of parotid tumors and
      postoperative complications after partial superficial or total parotidectomy with facial
      nerve dissection and superficial musculoaponeurotic system reconstruction.

clinical_study.brief_title: Retrospective Clinical Outcome of Parotid Tumor Surgery

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:

          -  Clinical diagnosis of parotid tumor

          -  Patients received the surgery of parotid tumor at NTUH by single surgeon ( Prof. Lou)
             from 2004/01 to 2012/12

        Exclusion criteria:

        -Inflammation or infection disease of parotid gland

study_pop.textblock:
All patients who underwent parotid surgery by a single operator in National Taiwan
        University Hospital from January 2004 to December 2012 were assessed for histopathological
        results and postoperative complications.

clinical_study.official_title: Retrospective Clinical Outcome of Parotid Tumor Surgery

primary_outcome.description: Record the grade of facial palsy in patients receiving the surgery of parotid tumor

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Retrospective
